text: Waterlooplein is an Amsterdam Metro station in the centre of Amsterdam, Netherlands. The station is close to the Stopera, the city hall of Amsterdam. ==The Station== The station opened in 1980 and is served by 3 lines, the 51 (Amsterdam Centraal - Amstelveen), 53 (Amsterdam Centraal - Gaasperplas) and 54 (Amsterdam Centraal - Gein). The station's location is close to the Waterlooplein, Rembrandt House Museum, the Stopera, Joods Historisch Museum, Hortus Botanicus and Hermitage Amsterdam. The metro station is only accessible with an OV-chipkaart or GVB Travel Pass. ==Tram services== * 9 - Amsterdam Centraal - City Centre - Waterlooplein - Plantage - Watergraafsmeer - Diemen Sniep * 14 - Sloterpark - Rozengracht - City Centre - Waterlooplein - Plantage - Flevopark Amsterdam Metro network ==References== *GVB website Category:Amsterdam Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 1980
